sentence.Network_en: They have been galvanised into collective action — militarily, politically and economically.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在形势驱使下已经在政治、经济和军事上采取了联合行动。

sentence.Network_en: Politically and economically this is an extremely difficult question.
sentence.Network_cn: 从政治和经济角度来看，这是一个极为棘手的问题。

sentence.Network_en: Their defense markets are too small to sustain economically viable production runs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的国防市场太小，就经济可行性而言不足以维持生产。

entry.def: Something that is economical does not require a lot of money to operate. For example a car that only uses a small amount of petrol is economical .

example.ex: ...plans to trade in their car for something smaller and more economical...
example.tran: 把他们的车折价贴换成更小、更经济型车的计划

example.ex: It is more economical to wash a full load.

entry.tran: 不浪费的;节俭的;节约的
entry.def: Someone who is economical spends money sensibly and does not want to waste it on things that are unnecessary. A way of life that is economical does not need a lot of money.
Economical means using the minimum amount of time, effort, or language that is necessary.

example.ex: His gestures were economical, his words generally mild.
example.tran: 他的肢体语言极尽简化，措词总体温和。

means.word_mean: 2. with respect to the economic system;

auth_sentence.content: Would the constitutional change be economically and financially stable?
auth_sentence.res_content: Would the constitutional change be economically and financially stable?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would the constitutional change be economically and financially stable?

auth_sentence.content: There's no way you can justify it economically.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's no way you can justify it economically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's no way you can justify it economically.

auth_sentence.content: But he says solar is simply not economically competitive.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he says solar is simply not economically competitive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he says solar is simply not economically competitive.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今

adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前

definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地

exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上

fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地

mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心

polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地

present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

Sentence.sentence: Corporations in Germany realized that there was an interest to be served economically and patriotically in building up a skilled labor force at home; we never had that ethos (风气)," says Richard Sennett, a New York University sociologist who has written about the connection of craft and culture.
Even so, the shift in the centre of gravity to older age groups is bound to have a profound effect on societies, not just economically and politically but in all sorts of other ways too.

means.word_mean: 节约地,节俭地;节省地；经济地

sentences.en: They were unable to run the telephone network economically.
sentences.cn: 他们未能经济地经营电话网络。

sentences.en: A tunnel was not considered economically feasible.
sentences.cn: 从经济上考虑，用隧道并不可行。

sentences.en: The company is in an economically vulnerable position.
sentences.cn: 该公司目前经济状况不稳定。

sentences.en: It is only their investment that makes the programme economically viable.
sentences.cn: 因为他们的投资，这个项目在经济上才得以通过。

sentences.en: It was felt that the ageing of society was socially and economically undesirable.
sentences.cn: 老龄化对于社会和经济的不良影响呈现出来了。
